name: SUPER-PHYSICAL TABLETOP KNICK-KNACK: Deconstructed Window View
description:
2/2
SPTKK is a memory recreation, the imaginary landscape of anomaly from video games.

The video game became the starting point for this fantasy of unbelievable space and narration for me. We sometimes encounter glitchy and buggy figures in games that were made as real as possible. But these oddities are interesting to me because of their impossibility in the real world.

Similar to reading Extra-Sensory Perception which is always associated with mystic, anomaly and wherein a person perceives information that cannot be obtained by physical senses. These two things are like a perception game and memories of past events.
